resources.string: Wi-Fi etkin noktayı etkin olmadığında devre dışı bırak

string.name: wifi_tether_users
string.description: Preference title for Wi-Fi hotspot users

string.name: wifi_tether_user_empty
string.description: Empty view for hotspot user list

resources.string: Wi-Fi etkin noktaya hiç kullanıcı bağlı değil.

string.name: ethernet_ip_address_not_set
string.description: Preference summary, let user know the IP address is not set

string.name: ethernet_network_prefix_length_not_set
string.description: Preference summary, let user know the network prefix length is not set

string.name: ethernet_gateway_not_set
string.description: Preference summary, let user know the gateway is not set

string.name: ethernet_dns1_not_set
string.description: Preference summary, let user know the DNS1 is not set

string.name: ethernet_dns2_not_set
string.description: Preference summary, let user know the DNS2 is not set

string.name: eth_dialog_set_ipaddress
string.description: A dialog title tell user input IP address

string.name: eth_dialog_set_network_prefix_length
string.description: A dialog title tell user input network prefix length

string.name: eth_dialog_set_gateway
string.description: A dialog title tell user input Gateway

string.name: eth_dialog_set_dns1
string.description: A dialog title tell user input DNS1

string.name: eth_dialog_set_dns2
string.description: A dialog title tell user input DNS2

string.name: ethernet_policy_title
string.description: toggle for user to click, if checked, ethernet will KEEP CONNECTION during sleep.

string.name: ethernet_policy_summary
string.description: perference summary, let user know if enabled will request extra power consumption

resources.string: Bağlantı kalitesini sağlamak için, lütfen kablosuz ekranı (Miracast) ya da Wi-Fi Direct\'i yeniden bağlamayı deneyin.
Yeniden bağlanmak için klavyenizde herhangi bir tuşa basın
